ON-DEMAND WEBINAR Virtual Care Beyond the Video Call: Delivering a Seamless Virtual Healthcare Experience Image Senior Woman Talking With Doctor
We wanted to make sure you had access to our recent webinar with Microsoft Canada. In this on-demand event, Patrick McCarthy, Assistant Vice President of Telehealth Services at Northwell Health, shares how his organization is leveraging an integrated virtual care platform to:
Maximize tech investments Increase access to care anywhere, anytime Improve communication and coordination for care teams and the clinician experience
Integrating communications across physical and virtual channels gives patients and providers the engagement options and experience they want, and it provides health systems with the security, coordination, information access and control they need.
Watch now <[[https://teladochealth.com/resources/webinar/virtual-care-beyond-the-video-call-with-northwell-health/?&utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=webinar-reminder&utm_campaign=202211-HHS-ENT-SWBR-NORTHWELL-MSFT-WBN-10-27]]>
Speakers
Peter Jones Healthcare Industry Lead Microsoft Canada
Patrick McCarthy Assistant Vice President, Telehealth Services Northwell Health
Cory Fry Senior Director, Client Success Teladoc Health Canada
To learn how to reduce fragmentation while increasing access to care, we also recommend our white paper, As Patient Care Channels Become More Fragmented, Communications & Coordination Can Become Integrated <[[https://teladochealth.com/resources/white-paper/as-patient-care-channels-become-more-fragmented-communications/?&utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=white-paper&utm_campaign=202211-HHS-ENT-SWBR-NORTHWELL-MSFT-WBN-10-28]]>.
